title: Mike Tyson 2.0 Cannabis Brand Back On Shelves Ahead of Fight With Jake Paul
description: Mike Tyson is set to fight Jake Paul in his first professional boxing match in nearly 20 years, pitting the 58-year-old hall of fame fighter against the 27-years-old internet celebrity. And while the whole thing is no doubt a branding jack-POT for all those involved, ironically Tyson’s pot brand is back on shelves again. Buzz60’s Tony Spitz has the details.
